Container.Name: Kometa
Container.Overview:
Kometa is an open source Python 3 project that has been designed to ease the creation and maintenance of metadata, collections, and playlists within a Plex Media Server. The script is designed to be run continuously and be able to update information based on sources outside your plex environment. Kometa supports Movie/TV/Music libraries and Playlists.
Unraid Setup Guide: https://kometa.wiki/en/latest/kometa/install/unraid/

Config.Name: Internal Config Location (--config)
Config.Description: Specify the internal location of the configuration YAML file.

Config.Name: Time to Run (--time)
Config.Description: Specify the times of day that Kometa will run with comma-separated list of times in HH:MM format.

Config.Name: Run Immediately (--run)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to perform a run immediately, bypassing the time to run flag.

Config.Name: Run Tests (--run-tests)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to perform a debug test run immediately, bypassing the time to run flag. This will only run collections with test: true in the definition.

Config.Name: Debug (--debug)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to run with Debug Logs Reporting to the Command Window.

Config.Name: Trace (--trace)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to run with extra Trace Debug Logs.

Config.Name: Log Requests (--log-requests)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to run with every network request printed to the Logs. This can potentially have personal information in it.

Config.Name: Timeout (--timeout)
Config.Description: Change the main Kometa timeout. This timeout is overwritten by those in your config file for those services.

Config.Name: Collections Only (--collections-only)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to only run collection files, skip metadata, library operations, overlays, and playlists.

Config.Name: Metadata Only (--metadata-only)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to only run metadata files, skip library operations, overlays, playlists, and collections.

Config.Name: Playlists Only (--playlists-only)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to only run playlist files, skip metadata, library operations, overlays, and collections.

Config.Name: Operations Only (--operations-only)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to only run library operations skipping metadata, collections, playlists, and overlays.

Config.Name: Overlays Only (--overlays-only)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to only run library overlays skipping metadata, collections, playlists, and library operations.

Config.Name: Run Collections (--run-collections)
Config.Description: Will immediately run the comma-separated list of Collection Names given, bypassing the time to run flag.

Config.Name: Run Libraries (--run-libraries)
Config.Description: Will immediately run the comma-separated list of Library Names given, bypassing the time to run flag.

Config.Name: Run Files (--run-files)
Config.Description: Will immediately run the comma-separated list of File Names given, bypassing the time to run flag.

Config.Name: Ignore Schedules (--ignore-schedules)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to ignore all schedules for the run.

Config.Name: Ignore Ghost (--ignore-ghost)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to ignore all ghost logging for the run. A ghost log is whatâ€™s printed to the console to show progress during steps.

Config.Name: Delete Collections (--delete-collections)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to delete all collections in a Library prior to running collections/operations.

Config.Name: Delete Labels (--delete-labels)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to delete all labels on every item in a Library prior to running collections/operations.

Config.Name: Resume Run (--resume)
Config.Description: Name of Collection to immediately resume running from the first instance of the specified collection, bypassing the time to run flag.

Config.Name: No Countdown (--no-countdown)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to run without displaying a countdown to the next scheduled run.

Config.Name: No Missing (--no-missing)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to run without utilizing the missing movie/show functions.

Config.Name: No Report (--no-report)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to run without saving the report.

Config.Name: Read Only Config (--read-only-config)
Config.Description: Set as 'true' to run without writing to the configuration file.

Config.Name: Divider Character (--divider)
Config.Description: Character to use as a divider in the logs.

Config.Name: Screen Width (--width)
Config.Description: Width of the Log Output. Integer between 90 and 300.

Config.Name: ENV Plex URL (--plex-url)
Config.Description: Plex URL to replace ENV in the config file.

Config.Name: ENV Plex Token (--plex-token)
Config.Description: Plex Token to replace ENV in the config file.
